description:
LIMITED TIME OFFER: Download the game now, and receive an extra THOUSAND free chips!! *** Word Ace combines the betting & strategy of Texas Hold 'Em Poker and the mental challenge of a word game. Combine your cards with the community cards to form the highest-scoring word, or bluff your way to victory! Includes:
* An interface that adapts to suit you - click or type your cards in.
 * Use your Friend List to find your friends and join their games or invite them to yours.
 * Every day you play, you earn a free chip bonus! Come back every day to maximize your free chips!

NOTE: If you are having trouble with the game, please email us! If you talk about a problem in a review, we have no way of getting in touch with you.

*** Don't forget to quit the app before updating!
